DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether video laryngioscopes facilitate intubation in ice-pick position in a manikin with restricted access to the airway
DOC.brief_title: Ice-pick Intubation With Video Laryngoscopes in a Manikin With Restricted Access to the Airway
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether video laryngioscopes facilitate intubation in ice-pick position (also called inverse intubation) in a manikin with restricted access to the airway
DOC.criteria: anaesthesiologists experienced in airway management experienced in emergency medicine no experience in airway management missing infiormed consent
